info.title: KRAIL-CONFIG Schema API
info.description: API for accessing KRAIL-CONFIG schemas including festivals and notices. Each schema type has its own endpoint for better organization.

get.description: Retrieve the festivals schema with structure and examples
Retrieve the info_tiles schema with structure and examples
Retrieve the notice schema with structure and examples
Retrieve the park_ride_facilities schema with structure and examples
Retrieve the whats_on_sydney schema with structure and examples
Retrieve all available schemas with their structure and examples

confirmedDates.description: List of festivals with fixed dates

variableDates.description: List of festivals with variable dates

confirmedDates.greeting: May the Force Ride With You

example.title: App Update Available
example.description: A new version of the app is available. Update now for new features.

url.description: Button URL (required for CTA and SHARE)

stopId.description: Unique identifier for the transit stop

parkRideFacilityId.description: Unique identifier for the park and ride facility

parkRideName.description: Display name of the park and ride facility
